parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and UTC time is used. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the dedicated instance.

parameters.name: SbcName
parameters.description:
The statistical metric. Valid values:

*   Maximum
*   Minimum
*   Average

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and UTC time is used. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ
